name: Fugu Demo
description: A simple web app showcasing the capabilities of the web!

shortcuts.name: Async Clipboard API
shortcuts.description: The Async Clipboard API, allows web application to read and write into the system's clipboard.

shortcuts.name: Web Share API
shortcuts.description: The Web Share API uses platform-specific sharing of a device to send data such as text, a URL, and more from a web application to any application.

shortcuts.name: Add to Home Screen
shortcuts.description: The ability to add an application to the home screen is a crucial feature of PWAs.

shortcuts.name: Media Session API
shortcuts.description: The Media Session API allows developers to create custom media notifications for audio or video content on the web.

shortcuts.name: Device Memory API
shortcuts.description: The Device Memory API provides insight into the memory available by providing the read-only property deviceMemory.

shortcuts.name: Service Worker API
shortcuts.description: Service workers act as a client-side proxy that puts developers in control of the system's cache and how to respond to resource requests.

shortcuts.name: Gamepad API
shortcuts.description: The Gamepad API is how web applications respond to input from gamepads and other game controllers.

shortcuts.name: Push API
shortcuts.description: The Push API allows web applications to receive messages from a server regardless of whether the application was in the foreground.
